data.title: NFRMPO
data.text:
The NFRMPO is the transportation and air quality planning agency for portions of Larimer and Weld counties in Northern Colorado

Image Credit:

Weld County

Image Credit:

Town of Windsor

Image Credit:

Town of Windsor

The NFRMPO is currently recruiting for an Accountant and a Transportation Planner I. View the Job Posting page for job descriptions and application process.

Check out the Safe Routes to School Resources webpage for more information on Safe Routes to School (SRTS), including SRTS funding opportunities.

The July 2024 TIP Amendment is open for public comment through August 8, 2024 and includes the addition of one new TIP project and the revision of two existing projects.

The 2025 Active Transportation Plan (ATP) is under development. Check out the webpage for more information, upcoming presentations, and to take the 2025 Active Transportation Plan Survey.

Learn more about LinkNoCo, the NFRMPO’s study of upgraded transit connections between communities in Larimer and Weld counties that Planning Council adopted on November 3, 2022.

Check out the Summer Edition of the On the Move Newsletter. Stay up to date on all of the region’s transportation news!

Learn more about air quality in the North Front Range.

VanGo™ provides vanpooling services in Northern Colorado. Learn more about VanGo™.

RideNoCo – Connecting You & Northern Colorado. Learn more about what mobility options you have in Northern Colorado.
